mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.visits,a.title,a.is_original,a.source_url,a.description,a.is_comment,a.content,a.create_time,a.update_time,a.url,a.status,a.type,a.likes,a.collects,a.comments,a.author , b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.url=#{url} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.is_top,a.image,a.create_time,a.url,a.author,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.is_top=TRUE AND a.status=1 and a.type = 0

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.is_top,a.image,a.create_time,a.url,a.visits,a.likes,a.collects,a.comments,a.author,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type = 0
AND a.is_top=FALSE
AND (a.title like #{keyword} OR a.description like #{keyword} OR a.content_md like #{keyword})

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.image,a.is_top,a.create_time,a.url,a.author,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id LEFT JOIN blog_article_tag c ON a.id=c.article_id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type=0 AND c.tag_id=#{tagId}

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,a.image,a.is_top,a.create_time,a.url,a.author,b.name AS category_name,b.url AS category_url FROM blog_article a LEFT JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id=b.id WHERE a.status=1 and a.type=0 AND a.category_id=#{categoryId}

select a.id,a.title,a.description,a.image,a.is_top,a.create_time,a.url,a.comments,a.likes,a.collects,a.visits,a.author,c.name AS category_name,c.url AS category_url from blog_article a left join blog_category c on c.id = a.category_id where a.status = 1
and a.category_id = (select id from blog_category where url=#{url})
AND (a.title like concat('%',#{q},'%') OR a.description like concat('%',#{q},'%') OR a.content_md like concat('%',#{q},'%'))
